name: Spongebob SquarePants - Legend of the lost spatula
name_original: Spongebob SquarePants - Legend of the lost spatula
description:
It's time to bring it around town

Ahoy mates!

Help SpongeBob SquarePants search For the Flying Dutchmans Golden Spatula.

IF you Find the Golden Spatula, SpongeBob will become the greatest Fry Cook oF all time!

____________________________________________________________________________________

Playable for the Nintendo Gameboy Color System and the Nintendo 3DS System.

Tips: You need to have a hacked Nintendo 3DS to install CIA games off the Nintendo 3DS SD card.

NOTE:

I am not the original creator of this game, I have nothing to do with anything in these games.

I give credits to:

Nintendo,

Nickelodeon,

THQ,

Vicarious Visions,

Stephen Hillenburg.
